safetyTips: Please speak directly for safety measures.
name: Sholden Village Store
description: Local village store, that sells a selection of everyday essentials. Newspapers, cards, helium balloons and we offer an engraving service too. For residents outside Sholden please call us and place an order and then we can take a payment over the phone and have your shopping ready to just pick up.  We also have out of hours collection time of shopping for front line workers.
